sentence.Network_en: Perhaps he was agonizing over the moral issues involved.
sentence.Network_cn: 也许他正在为其中牵扯的道德问题而伤脑筋。

sentence.Network_en: This is a torturous, agonizing way to kill someone.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是一种让人受尽折磨、痛苦难忍的杀人方法。

sentence.Network_en: He watched helplessly as his mother died an agonizing death.
sentence.Network_cn: 他无助地看着母亲痛苦地死去。

17. 濒死期（agonal stage）：又称临终状态。机体各系统的功能发生严重障碍，脑干以上部位处于深度抑制状态，表现为意识模糊或消失，各.
agomphosis无牙，缺牙，牙动agonal breathing 终末频死呼吸agonist 兴奋剂，激动剂

entry.def: Something that is agonizing causes you to feel great physical or mental pain.

example.ex: He did not wish to die the agonizing death of his mother and brother...
example.tran: 他不想像母亲和兄弟那样痛苦地死去。

example.ex: In the heat of Rome, the wait was agonizing.
example.tran: 在罗马的高温下，等待是一种折磨。

entry.def: Agonizing decisions and choices are very difficult to make.

example.ex: He now faced an agonizing decision about his immediate future.
example.tran: 他这时候面临着一个关系到他不久的将来的痛苦抉择。

auth_sentence.content: Every lurch...sent a spasm of agonizing pain coursing through his body.
auth_sentence.res_content: Every lurch...sent a spasm of agonizing pain coursing through his body.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Every lurch...sent a spasm of agonizing pain coursing through his body.

auth_sentence.content: Naida's agonizing death in central Donetsk in June 2010 was filmed by activists from Animal Protection.
auth_sentence.res_content: Naida's agonizing death in central Donetsk in June 2010 was filmed by activists from Animal Protection.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Naida's agonizing death in central Donetsk in June 2010 was filmed by activists from Animal Protection.

auth_sentence.content: It has, for me, led to an agonizing struggle -- the proverbial long, dark night of the soul.
auth_sentence.res_content: It has, for me, led to an agonizing struggle -- the proverbial long, dark night of the soul.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It has, for me, led to an agonizing struggle -- the proverbial long, dark night of the soul.

means.word_mean: 使人极度痛苦的；使人苦闷的;使人烦恼的

sentences.en: It was an agonizing decision for him.
sentences.cn: 这对他来说是一个痛苦的决定。

sentences.en: The accused faces an agonizing wait while the jury considers its verdict.
sentences.cn: 陪审团讨论裁决期间，被告面临痛苦的等待。
